notes: Increases the owner's total attack damage against buildings, including raw damage bonuses.
The bonus damage is only applied when attacking buildings.

name: The Leveller
description: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.
trivia: An early version of The Leveller was revealed in the 6.60 beta (46), but was never added to the release version. It required Quelling Blade, 2 Wraith Bands, and Blade of Alacrity to build. It granted 6 strength, 22 agility, 6 intelligence, and passively increased the wielder's attack damage against non-hero units by 40%, and against buildings by 60%.
It required Quelling Blade, 2 Wraith Bands, and Blade of Alacrity to build.
It granted 6 strength, 22 agility, 6 intelligence, and passively increased the wielder's attack damage against non-hero units by 40%, and against buildings by 60%.
tips: Best shared on heroes with powerful pushing potential such as Tiny, Dragon Knight, or Lycan.
You can also share this to heroes with attack modifiers such as bash or critical hit due to the attack speed bonus.
